title: Combination Axe
content:
Combination Axe Rare 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing Critical Virtuoso: When you score a Critical Hit you can spend a Bonus Action to make an additional attack. Press the Advantage: After scoring a Critical Hit, use your Bonus Action to make an additional attack. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The intricate engravings on this axe's blade and handle make plain the skill of its smith.. Battleaxe Versatile 1.8 310

Versatile -
